column1: What to do if you are sick with 2019 Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/about/steps-when-sick.html via @CDCgov
My polymers professor is giving us full points on our hw as “reparations” for the coronavirus being in Tempe

As always I look to @jspotila to break down the facts & dispel the fears. She helps #mecfs/ immunocompromised patients understand the risk of #COVID19 while also providing practical & science-based tips to stay as safe as possible. This is also invaluable to our caregivers.
RT @nokidhungry: Our fundraising events rely on culinary professionals donating their time, passion and heart to our work. But the #COVID19…
